text:
The famous Masi festival at the Mandaikadu Bhagavathi Amman Temple would begin with traditional flag-hoisting on February 28, temple sources said.

Thousands of devotees from Kerala and Tamil Nadu will throng the temple to witness the flag-hosting ceremony.

The “koda” festival is the most important event at the temple located near Colechal.

The festival will end on March 8. Arrangements for the festival are being done by officials of the Hindu Religious and Charitable Endowments department.
title: Masi festival from February 28
